events.body: @MarcoFalke Thank you for your review. Your comments have been addressed.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15607](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15607.html) ([Docs] Release process updates by jonatack)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

rename.from: scripts and tools, docs: Align MSVC build options with Linux build ones
rename.to: docs: Align MSVC build options with Linux build ones

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1,18 +1,26 @@
 Release Process
 ====================
 
+Just after branching off a new release:
+
+* In `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` on _the master branch_:
+  - update `CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR` version
+* In `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` on _a new release branch_:
+  - update `CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR` version
+  - set `CLIENT_VERSION_REVISION` to `0`
+  - set `CLIENT_VERSION_IS_RELEASE` to `true`
+
 Before every release candidate:
 
 * Update translations (ping wumpus on IRC) see [translation_process.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/translation_process.md#synchronising-translations).
-
 * Update manpages, see [gen-manpages.sh](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/devtools/README.md#gen-manpagessh).
-* Update release candidate version in `configure.ac` (`CLIENT_VERSION_RC`)
+* Update release candidate version in `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` (`CLIENT_VERSION_RC`).
comments.body: msvc is a dev-only build and never released, the version stays at .99

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1,18 +1,26 @@
 Release Process
 ====================
 
+Just after branching off a new release:
+
+* In `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` on _the master branch_:
+  - update `CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR` version
+* In `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` on _a new release branch_:
+  - update `CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR` version
+  - set `CLIENT_VERSION_REVISION` to `0`
+  - set `CLIENT_VERSION_IS_RELEASE` to `true`
+
 Before every release candidate:
 
 * Update translations (ping wumpus on IRC) see [translation_process.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/translation_process.md#synchronising-translations).
-
 * Update manpages, see [gen-manpages.sh](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/devtools/README.md#gen-manpagessh).
-* Update release candidate version in `configure.ac` (`CLIENT_VERSION_RC`)
+* Update release candidate version in `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` (`CLIENT_VERSION_RC`).
 
 Before every minor and major release:
 
 * Update [bips.md](bips.md) to account for changes since the last release.
-* Update version in `configure.ac` (don't forget to set `CLIENT_VERSION_IS_RELEASE` to `true`) (don't forget to set `CLIENT_VERSION_RC` to `0`)
-* Write release notes (see below)
+* Update version in `configure.ac` and `build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h` (don't forget to set `CLIENT_VERSION_RC` to `0`).
